channel.title: Is there any way to
channel.description:
Is there any way that I can make a portal have a certain text above it? I know I can put npc's in front of it and have them saying what it is, but is there a way to put a code with the portal making it float above it or talk like an npc?
If so could u give me an example or explain with detail how I could do this? Thx.
